label: 女房
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A woman of good family who serves a higher-ranking lord or lady.  Murasaki Shikibu herself was a gentlewoman in an Empress’s service.  In some cases the woman could be of considerable rank herself; for example, in “Kagerō” a Princess becomes a gentlewoman to the Empress.  [紫式部、蜻蛉][RK]
